original: intros d0 d1 sigma H1 H2 a s H3. unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign in *. intros a0 s0 H4. intros H5. apply predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 H1']. apply predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 in H2. destruct H2 as [H2 H2']. unfold preDTA_produit. destruct d0. - destruct d1. + unfold preDTA_produit_l. apply predta_produit_5 in H5. destruct H5 as [a1 [a2 [s1 [s2 [H6 [H7 H8]]]]]]. rewrite H6 in *. eauto. + eauto. - destruct d1. + eauto. + unfold preDTA_produit_r. apply predta_produit_5 in H5. destruct H5 as [a1 [a2 [s1 [s2 [H6 [H7 H8]]]]]]. rewrite H6 in *. eauto.
